phrases: Hey, do you think people avoid us when we come through?
But we are not doing anything!
I heard there is a real intimidating guy at Shuuei High, too.
Someone who saw him said he is over two meters tall, like a new species of bear!
I heard he almost killed someone right in front of the cops.
It is just like an urban legend!
No way he is two meters tall.
Yeah, and a new bear species?
He is totally over two meters tall!
He is going to strangle me!
He is going to eat me!
The urban legend has a girlfriend!
I am Gouda Takeo, a first-year in high school.
but I still feel like I am in spring.
Can we celebrate with my friends and yours?
No one seems to have any plans.
I had not thought of that.
I am already a happy man, anyway...
Whoa, a Christmas party with girls?
That would be a first for me!
It would be my first time since elementary school!
This year, I will not have to walk through the streets, crying!
I knew you would say that.
Can I tell Nanako-chan at that Christmas thing?
Well, tell her that I want to ask her out.
Should we ask Yamato for permission, too?
I see, he likes her now.
I hope you will be happy together.
Inbox From: Takeo-kun To: Yamato Rinko Subject: Christmas
Takeo-kun and his friends are on for Christmas!
I will try asking right now
No, you do not have to ask!
What does it mean if a guy tries to hold your hand?
Does not that mean he likes you?
That is what I would think.
Kurihara asked for my contact info,
and we went to a movie once...
Um, does not that mean he likes you?!
He has not said anything definite.
If he did not like you a little, he would not have asked you to the movies!
How do you feel about Kurihara-kun?
If he asked, I guess I could go out with him.
Anything I can do to help?!
Want me to ask Takeo-kun about it?
No, do not worry about it.
What should I get as a present?
Man, I need to work more hours.
So a reservation for twelve, on December 24th, at 4 PM?
There is a big Christmas tree in the courtyard.
Oh, the Christmas tree can be seen from all the rooms.
It is even better at night!
Oh, and there is a story about that tree.
At the very top, there is one star that is different from the rest.
You can see it all the way from here, Takeo-kun?
If you pluck that star and ask someone out,
Well, it is cold and your hands go numb, so you cannot really climb up there.
so no one's ever managed it...
Oh, but I think you might be able to.
No, I do not need it anymore.
but which karaoke room would you like?
That star should grant someone else's love.
I am so looking forward to Christmas!
We have all been talking about how we would like to exchange gifts and stuff.
By the way, is Kurihara-kun coming?
You would not hold hands with someone unless you liked them, right?
Right, I should check in with Yamato.
Yamato, Kurihara said he likes Nanako-san.
He would like to ask her out on Christmas.
Let us give them plenty of opportunities to be alone!
Let us help them out as best we can!
It is going to be a merry Christmas.
Wow, Nanako-chan, are not you cold with bare legs?
There is a huge Christmas tree in the courtyard!
Toward the top of the tree, there is this one star that is different from the rest.
They say if you take that star and then ask someone out,
Hey, do not you think that only Takeo could get that?
Nanako, can I sit next to you?
Wow, I am sitting next to Nanako-chan.
Nanako-chan, I can pass you anything you want to try.
I should try to learn from him.
No, I do not like spicy food...
It was spicier than I expected.
I will eat it for you.
Takeo and Yamato-san make such a good pair.
Do you ever think about wanting a boyfriend, Nanako-chan?
Well, sure, like any other girl.
I bet you have high standards!
I bet they are sky high!
What is he going on about?
Is not he going to ask her out?
Hey, why do not we go see the Christmas tree?
Let us go to the courtyard!
You are trying to create a good mood.
It is much bigger than the one at home!
Yeah, it goes up to the ceiling.
Hey, let us take a photo.
It is pretty, but it is also super cold out here!
What are you waiting for, Nanako-chan?
We put everyone is presents in this bag and tied ribbons to them,
There is no way to tell who will get whose present!
Let us figure out the drawing order!
Sunakawa-kun, just pick whichever you would like.
I do not really do songs,
so I will just be on the tambourine.
I will be on the maracas today, too.
Cannot catch up, but I want to.
Can one of the girls sing with me?
Nanako, you are good at this song, too.
I want to hear Nanako sing!
I wish love would work out like sweets, as long as you follow the recipe.
I wish the distance between us would change with time, just like meringues do.
Cannot catch up, but I want
The more clumsy and awkward we are...
You are here, just the two of you?
Come join us in our room!
I think I have seen her before...
She is the urban legend's girlfriend!
Why did not you help me yourself?!
I should not have told you!
Do not try so hard to get us together!
Not everyone can be like you guys,
all lovey-dovey and head over heels about each other, okay?!
I guess this was not helping her at all.
I should have been more considerate of Nanako's feelings.
but that has nothing to do with how others feel.
I cannot do anything about how they feel.
I really have to be more careful...
We have to learn how to just watch over them without interfering.
That is what Sunakawa-kun did for us.
Being kind enough not to do anything...
To have the heart to watch over them without saying anythingthat's it.
Well, for now, let us go back.
how could one of me beat three of them?
I just thought it would complicate things
or put her in danger, you know?
Be kind enough not to do anything.
Have the heart to watch over them without saying anything.
and I am not as strong as Takeo.
Not that I have any confidence that I could have talked my way out of it,
Maybe I am just below average in every way.
Be kind enough not to do anything.
Watch over them without saying any
But maybe she wanted you to help, anyway!
I cannot do anything about this now, but you still can!
Rinko, I am so sorry about what I said
Nanako, you should know that Kurihara-kun's...
Um, Kurihara-kun wants to get that star for you!
How many times have you already fallen off?
I am going to take that star and ask Nanako-chan out...
When Yamato-san told us about the star,
Nanako-chan looked like she wanted that to happen!
I acted like it was nothing because I felt self-conscious about it...
I am not strong like Takeo,
but I do want to show the girl I like what I am capable of as a man!
I am not strong like Takeo...
I am a pushover, and I tend to just go with the flow,
but I do like you, Nanako-chan!
I am not honest about my feelings like Rinko.
and I can be hard to get along with.
I like that about you, too!
I like how you are a pushover, too!
Takeo-kun, this is a separate gift.
Well, I always thought she had nice legs,
but when I just blurted it out during our skating outing,
it totally rubbed her the wrong way!
When she looked at me like I was a worm,
I just fell for her right there.
And on the train ride home,
I did not want to make any more wrong moves,
so I would thrown both hands up in the air.
She was giving me this wry smile that was so cute...
I was just about to call you.
Osamu said his winter break starts tomorrow!
We are all on winter break.
I bet Nanako and Kurihara-kun will have their first kiss really fast.
We kissed on our way back from the Christmas get-together.
I wonder if I am just not attractive like that...
All of a sudden, she is acting superior
